rule: Medium - Secret : This card is a secret, convince everyone to do a group task or be caught spy
Medium - Secret : There's something outside, is it a bird, is it a plane, describe something incredible you see, if people walk away from the window take a drink
Medium - Secret : I just hate this song, get the next song changed early or receive a punishment
Medium - Secret : Mr steal your girl, hijack a conversation and push someone out, as soon as they leave apologise for being a prick
Medium - Secret : Pick a target,  tap them on the shoulder 3 times without them asking to see this card
Easy - Secret : No, I am spartacus, anyone who does do the thing drinks
Medium - Secret : Assassin, you target is to your left, subtly kill them, if anyone but them notices you lose
Hard -Secret : don't speak, subtly lick everyone in the room
Medium - Secret : Slip an obscure word into a conversation at least 3 times, penalty if anyone notices
Easy - Secret : I think your fly is undone, get someone to look without being called out on this card
Medium - Secret : What’s that outside, convince someone to leave the room without getting called on this card
Medium - Secret : Secret santa, get someone to tell you what they want for christmas without being called on this card
Easy - Secret : Find a penny, pick it up, get it into someones drink and save the queen
Easy - Secret : You sly dog, convince someone it was actually their turn to draw, if they do play the next card, if not you get punished
Medium - Secret : You mission should you choose to accept it is to give this card to another player, this message will self destruct in 30 seconds
Easy - Secret : Is this word spelled write, convince another player they misspelt a word
Medium - Secret : Weird science, the skin on the elbow has no nerve endings, prove this is true by licking someone else's without them noticing
Easy - Secret : Wink murder, wink at everyone in the room without being called out on it
Easy - Secret : I got an ouchie, convince someone in the room to kiss it better, points for style
Medium - Secret : This is such a nice material, convince everyone in the room to touch an item of your clothing
Easy - Secret : Cheapskate, drink from another players glass without them noticing
Easy - Secret : The circle of life, just start singing the opening to the lion king until at least 3 other people join in, punishments to anyone that doesn’t join
Medium - Secret : Not always danger, convince someone your middle name is Blank, literally the word Blank, by any means necessary
Easy - Secret : Do I know you, get someone's name wrong 3 times without being called out
Medium - Secret : Not the drink you're looking for, convince two people they accidentally swapped drinks, get them to drink each others or you lose
Medium - Secret : Announce loudly that you have just shit yourself, anyone who doesn't applaud drinks
Easy - Secret; get someone to fall for the classic what’s up dog trick
Easy - Secret service, everyone may only speak if you hold two fingers up to your ear, calls must be finished with over or out
Medium - Secret: Naughty, call out something a player says as an innuendo, do this 3 times without being caught
Medium - Secret: Just checking, ask at least 5 people if they are having a fun time without being caught
Medium - Secret: That old move, yawn and put your arm around the person to your left or right without being called out on it
Medium - Secret: Yes man, agree with everything said to you and nod very enthusiastically, if you aren’t called out you can make everyone drink
Medium - Secret: Health trend, convince someone that you have just started a fake health trend, if they call you out you lose
Medium - Secret : Man spread, you must take up as much space as possible, ignore all protests
Medium - Secret: Cupid, blow a kiss to three people without being called out on it
Medium - Secret: google it, get someone to google a dubious fact you tell them, if you can you can make them drink, if not you can
Hard - Secret: Drama queen, shout out that you refuse to do that and storm out of the room, anyone who comes to get you is a kind soul, everyone else can drink
Medium - Secret: Fly on the wall, there is a flying insect that you are trying to swat, if you can mime for a minute without being called out you win
